titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council. A proclamation. Sydney, Tho: Coningesby. Forasmuch as the great clemency and indulgence which their Majesties have extended to their Popish subjects of this kingdom, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Took printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 8th day of December, 1690.".
Steele notation: Arms 201. Indulgence of 2) re- a-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
